name: Drive with Death
description:
Take control of Death as he helps lost souls depart to the afterlife. Pick up the little hitchhikers and fix their baggage to the roof of your car, but be sure not to lose them by colliding with obstacles blocking your path.

Made in 3 days for Team Panoptes Jam II, with a theme of "departure".

Credits:

Programming by Roy Filipchuk (sgtscum)

Art and Programming by Taylor Van Dommelen (vincinerated)

Music by Dylan Doerr
